GV05brupsb4u:323: ato namaste 'stvime videhāstava yatheṣṭaṃ bhujyantāmayaṃ cāhamasmi dāsabhāve sthito yatheṣṭaṃ māṃ rājyaṃ ca pracatipadyasvetyarthaḥ //4,2.4//

GV05brupsb4u:618: tatra nāmarūpopādhisādṛśyaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ yattadeva heturna svata ityetaducyate /
GV05brupsb4u:619: yasmātsa samānaḥ sannubhau lokāvanukrameṇa sañcarati tadetatpratyakṣamityetaddarśayati-yato dhyāyatīva dhyānavyāpāraṃ karotīva
GV05brupsb4u:620: cintayatīva dhyānavyāpavatīṃ buddhiṃ sa tatsthena citsvabhāvajyotarūpeṇāvabhāsayaṃstatsadṛśastatsamānaḥ sandhyātīvālokavadeva /
GV05brupsb4u:624: teṣveva karameṣu buddhyādiṣu vāyuṣu ca calatsu tadavabhāsakatvāttatsadṛśaṃ taditi lelāyatīva
GV05brupsb4u:626: kathaṃ punaretadavagamyate tatsamānatvabhrāntirevobhayalokasaṃcaraṇādirhetutvaṃ svata ityasyārthasya pradarśanāya hetarupadiśyate- sa ātmā hi yasmātsvapno bhūtvā /
GV05brupsb4u:627: sa yayā dhiyā samānaḥ sā dhīryadyadbhavati tattadasāvapu bhavatīva tasmādyadāsau svapno bhavati svāpavṛttiṃ pratipadyate dhīstadā so 'pi
GV05brupsb4u:629: dā dhīrjajāgariṣati tadāsāvapyata āha-svapno bhūtvā svapnavṛttimavabhāsayandhiyaḥ svāpavṛtyākāro bhūtvema lokaṃ jāgaritavyavahāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryakaraṇasaṅghātātmakaṃ laukikaśāstrīyavyavahārāspadamatikrāmatyatītya krāmati viviktena
GV05brupsb4u:630: svenā'tmajyotiṣā svapnātmikā dhīvṛttamavabhāyannavatiṣṭhate yasmāttasmātsvayañjyotaḥsvabhāva evāsau viśuddhaḥ sa kartṛkriyākārakaphalaśūnyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:632: mṛtyorūpā ṇi mṛtyuḥ karmāvidyādirna tasyānyadrūpaṃ svataḥ kāryakaraṇānyevāsya rūpāṇi /
GV05brupsb4u:634: nanu nāstyeva dhiyā samānamanyaddhiyo 'vabhāsakamātmajyotiḥ pratyakṣeṇa vānumānena palambhāt
GV05brupsb4u:638: tatra bhavatvanyatvenā'lokasyopambhādghaṭādeḥ saṃśliṣṭayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ bhinnayoreva na ca tatheha ghaṭāderiva dhiyoṣa'vabhāsakaṃ jyotirintaraṃ pratyakṣeṇa vānumānena vopalabhāmahe dhīreva hi citsvarūpāvabhāsakatvenasvākārā viṣayākārā ca /
GV05brupsb4u:639: tasmānnānumānato nāpi pratyakṣato dhiyo 'vabhāsakaṃ jyotiḥ śakyate pratipādayituṃ vyatiriktam
GV05brupsb4u:645: yadevaṃ tadā na bāhyo dṛṣṭānto 'sti vijñānalakṣaṇamātratvātsarvasya /
GV05brupsb4u:646: eṃ tasyava vijñānas grāhyāgrāhakākāratāmalaṃ pakarikalpya tasyaiva punarviśuddhaṃ parikalpayanti
GV05brupsb4u:647: tadgrāhakavinirmuktaṃ vijñānaṃ svacchībhūtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ vyavatiṣṭhata iti kecit /
GV05brupsb4u:649: tadapi vijñānaṃ saṃvṛtaṃ grāhyagrāhakāṃśavinirumuktaṃ śūnyameva ghaṭādibāhyavastuvadityapare mādhyamikā ācakṣate /
GV05brupsb4u:655: pradīpādyālokasaṃyogena tu niyamenaivāvabhāsyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ sāloko ghaṭa iti
GV05brupsb4u:656: saṃśliṣṭayorapu ghaṭālokayoranyatvameva punaḥ punaḥ saṃśleṣe viśleṣe ca viśeṣadarśanādrajjughaṭayoriva
GV05brupsb4u:657: anyatve ca vyatiriktāvabhāsakatvaṃ na svātmanaiva svamātmānamavabhāsayati
GV05brupsb4u:663: yadyapi pradīpo 'nyasyāvabhāsakaḥ svayamavabhāsātkatvāttathāpu vyatiriktacaitanyāvabhāsyatvaṃ na vyabhicarati ghaṭādivadeva /
GV05brupsb4u:665: nanu yathā ghaṭaścaitanyāvabhāsyatve 'pi sannātmānaṃ ghaṭaṃ cāvabhāsayati
GV05brupsb4u:668: yathā caitanyāvabhāsyatvaṃ ghaṭasya tathā pradīpasyāpi caitanyāvabhāsyatvamaviśiṣṭam /
GV05brupsb4u:669: yattūcyate pradīpa ātmānaṃ ghaṭaṃ cāvabhāsayatīti tadasat /
GV05brupsb4u:672: na hi tadā pradīpasya svato vā parato vā viśeṣaḥ kaścidupalabhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:673: sa hyavabhāsyo bhavati yasyāvabhāsakasaṃnidhāvasaṃnidhau ca viśeṣa ātmānaṃ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti mṛṣaivācyot /
GV05brupsb4u:677: caitanyagrāhyatve ca vijñānasya kiṃ grāhyavijñānagrāhyataiva kiṃvā grāhakavijñānagrāhyateti tatrasaṃdihyamāne vastuni yo 'nyatra dṛṣṭo nyāyaḥ sa kalpayituṃ yukto na tu dṛṣṭaviparītaḥ tathā ca sati yathā vyitiriktenaiva grāhakeṇa bāhyānāṃ pradīpānāṃ grāhyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā vijñānasyāpi caitanyagrāhyatvātpkāśakatve satyāpi pradīpavadvyatiriktacaitanyagrāhyatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayituṃ na tvananyagrāhyatvam /
GV05brupsb4u:678: yaśvānyo vijñānasya grahītā sa ātmā jyotirantaraṃ vijñānāt /
GV05brupsb4u:680: naḥ grāhyatvamātra hi tadgrāhakasya vastvantaratve liṅgamuktaṃ nyāyataḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:681: na tvekāntato grāhakatve tadgrāhakāntarāstitve vā kadācidapi liṅgaṃ saṃbhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:687: yatra vastvantareṇa gṛhyate vastvantaraṃ tatragrāhyagrāhakavyatiriktaṃ karaṇāntaraṃ syāditi naikāntena niyantuṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb4u:693: ghaṭavaccakṣurgrāhyatve 'pi pradīpasya cakṣuḥ pradīpavyatirekeṇa na bāhyamālokasthānīyaṃ kiñcitkaraṇāntaramapekṣate
GV05brupsb4u:694: tasmānnaiva niyantuṃ śakyate yatra yatra vyatiriktagrāhakagrāhyatvaṃ tatra tatra karaṇāntaraṃ syādeveti /
GV05brupsb4u:695: tasmādvijñānasya vyaktiriktagrāhakagrāhyatve na karaṇadvārānavasthā nāpi grāhakatvadvārā kadācidapyupapādayituṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb4u:697: nanu nāstyeva bāhyor'tho ghaṭādiḥ pradīpo vā vijñānavyatiriktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:698: yaddhi yadvyatirekeṇa nopalamyate tattāvanmātraṃ vastu dṛṣṭam /
GV05brupsb4u:702: tatra yaduktaṃ vijñānasya vyatiriktāvabhāsyatvādvijñānavyatiriktamasti jyotirantaraṃ gaṭāderiveti tanmithyā /
GV05brupsb4u:709: vijñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ pradīpa iti ca śabdārthapṛthaktvādyāvattāvajadapi bāhyamarthāntaramavaśyamabhyupagantavyam
GV05brupsb4u:710: vijñānādarthāntaraṃ vastu na cedabhyupagamyate vijñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa ityevamādīnāṃ bhabdānāmekārthatve paryāyaśabdatvaṃ prāpnoti /
GV05brupsb4u:716: na hyātmīyaṃ vijñāna nirākartavyamabhyupagamyate svayaṃ vā'tmā kasyacit /
GV05brupsb4u:718: na ca pravādyādayaḥ svātmanaiva gṛhyanta ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:722: tasmādvijñānavādināpi na śakyaṃ vijñānavyatiriktaṃ jyotirantaraṃ nirākartum /
GV05brupsb4u:726: bhavataiva viṣayo ghaṭādiryadyabhāvo yadi vā bhāvaḥ syādubhayathāpi ghaṭādivijñānasya bhāvabhūtatvamabhyupagatameva
GV05brupsb4u:730: yattūktaṃ sāloko 'nyaścānyaśca ghaṭo jāyata iti tadasat /
GV05brupsb4u:731: kṣaṇāntare 'pi sa evāyaṃ ghaṭa iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GV05brupsb4u:739: na hi dṛśyamānalūnotthitakeśanakhādiṣu vyaktinimittaḥ sa eveti pratyayo bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:742: pratyakṣeṇa hi pratyabhijñāyamāne vastuni tadeveti na cānyatvamanumātuṃ yuktaṃ pratyakṣavirodhe liṅgasyā'bhāsatvopapatteḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:745: ekasya hi vastudarśino vastvantaradarśane sādṛśyapratyayaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:750: teneti dṛṣṭaṃ smṛtvā yāvadidimiti vartamānakṣaṇakālamavatiṣṭheta tataḥ kṣaṇikavādahāniḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:751: atha tenetyavopakṣīṇaḥ smārtaḥ pratyaya idamiti cānya eva vārtamānikaḥ pratyayaḥ kṣīyate tataḥ sādṛśyapratyatānupapattistenedaṃ sadṛśamiti /
GV05brupsb4u:756: athādṛṣṭavato vyapadeṣaḥ sādṛśyapratyayaśca tadānūṃ jātyandhasyeva rūpaviśeṣavyapadeśastatsādṛśyapratyayaśca sarvamandhaparampareti prasajyeta sarvajñaśāstrapraṇayanādi /
GV05brupsb4u:759: dṛṣṭavyapadeśahetuḥ pūrvettarasahita eka eva hi śṛṅgalāvatpratyayo jāyata iti cet /
GV05brupsb4u:764: pratyayau bhinnakālau tadubhayapratyayaviṣayaspṛkcecchṛṅkhalāpratyayastataḥ kṣaṇadvayāvyāpitvādekasya vijñānasya punaḥ kṣaṇavādahāniḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:774: na tusvābhāvikena raktatvādīnāṃ dravyāntarayogena viyojanaṃ dṛśyate tatrāpi saṃyogapūrvatvamanumīyate
GV05brupsb4u:778: viṣayaviṣayyābhāsatvaṃ ca yanmalaṃ parikalpyate vijñānasya tadapyanyasaṃsargābhāvādānupapannam
GV05brupsb4u:780: asati cānyasaṃsargeyo dharmo yasya dṛṣṭaḥ sa tatsvabhātvānna tena viyogamarhati /
GV05brupsb4u:782: tasmādanityasaṃsargeṇa malinatvaṃ tadviśuddhiśca vijñānasyetīyaṃ kalpanāndhaparamparaiva pramāṇaśūnyetyavagamyate
GV05brupsb4u:783: yadapi tasya vijñānasya nirvāṇaṃ puruṣārthaṃ kalpayanti tatrāpi phalāśrayānupapattiḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:784: kaṇṭakaviddhasya hi kaṇṭakavedhajanitaduḥkhanivṛttiḥ phalaṃ na tu kaṇṭakaviddhamaraṇe tadduḥkhanivṛttaphalasyā'śraya upapadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:786: yasya hi puruṣaśabdavācyasya satvasyātmano vijñānasya cārthaḥ parikalpyate tasya punaḥ puruṣasya nirvāṇe kasyārthaḥ puruṣārtha iti syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:787: yasya punarastyanekārthadaśīṃ vijñānavyatirikta ātmā tasya dṛṣṭasmaraṇadukhasaṃyogaviyogādi sarvamevopapannamanyasaṃyoganimittaṃ kāluṣyaṃ tadviyoganimittā ca viśuddhiriti /
GV05brupsb4u:791: sa vā ayaṃ puruṣo jāyamānaḥ śarīram abhisampadyamānaḥ pāpmabhiḥ saṃsṛjyate
GV05brupsb4u:792: sa utkrāman mriyamāṇaḥ pāpmano vijahāti || BrhUp_4,3.8 ||
GV05brupsb4u:793: BrhUpBh_4,3.8 yathaivehaikasmindehe svapno bhūtvā mṛtyo rūpāṇi kāryakaraṇānyatikramya svapne sva ātmajyetiṣyāsta evaṃ sa vai prakṛtaḥ puruṣo 'jāyamānaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:794: kathaṃ jāyamāna ityucyate-śarīraṃ dehendriyasaṃghātamabhisaṃpadyamānaḥ śarīra ātmabhāvamāpadyamāna ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:798: tāneva saṃśliṣyānpāpmarūpakāryakaraṇopādānaparityāgābhyāmanavaracaṃ saṃcarati dhiyā samānaḥ san, tathā so 'yaṃ puruṣa ubhāvihalokaparokau janmamaraṇābhyāṃ kāryakaraṇopādānaparityāgāvanavarataṃ pratipadyamāna ā saṃsāramokṣātsaṃcarati /
GV05brupsb4u:800: na hi taddharmatve sati taireva saṃyogo viyogo vā yuktaḥ //4,3.8//
GV05brupsb4u:802: tasya vā etasya puruṣasya dve eva sthāne bhavataḥ |
GV05brupsb4u:805: tasminsandhye sthāne tiṣṭhan ubhe sthāne paśyatīdaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca
GV05brupsb4u:807: tam ākramam ākramyobhayān pāpmana ānandāṃś ca paśyati |
GV05brupsb4u:808: sa yatra prasvapity asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā svena jyotiṣā prasvapiti |
GV05brupsb4u:810: BrhUpBh_4,3.9 nanu na syo 'syobhau lokau yau janmamaraṇābhyāmanukrameṇa
GV05brupsb4u:812: svapnajāgarite tu pratyakṣamavagamyete na tvihalokaparalokau kenacitpramaṇena /
GV05brupsb4u:814: ucyate-tasyaitasya puruṣasya vai dve e sthāne bhavato na tṛtacīyaṃ caturthaṃ vā /
GV05brupsb4u:820: nanu svapno 'pi paralokasthā ca sati dve evetyavadhāraṇamayuktam /
GV05brupsb4u:826: na hi grāmayoḥ saṃdhastāveva grāmāvapekṣya tṛtīyatvaparigaṇanamarhati /
GV05brupsb4u:827: kathaṃ punastasya paralokasthāsyāstitvamavagamyate yadapekṣya svapnasthānaṃ saṃdhyaṃ bhavet
GV05brupsb4u:828: yatastasminsaṃdhye svapnasthāne tiṣṭanbhavanvartamāna ete ubhe sthāne paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:831: tasmātstaḥ svapnajāgaritavyatirekeṇobhau lokau yo dhiyā samānaḥ sannanusaṃcarati janmamaraṇasaṃtānaprabandhena
GV05brupsb4u:832: kathaṃ punaḥ svapne sthitaḥ lokau paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:837: ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paralokasthāne pratipattavye nimitte yathākramo bhavati yādṛśenaparalokapratipattisādhanena vidyākarmapūrvaprajñānalakṣaṇena yukto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:841: na tu punaḥ sākṣādeva pāpmanāṃ darśanaṃ saṃbhavati tasmātpāpaphalāni duḥkhānītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:844: yāni ca pratipattavyajanmaviṣayāṇi kṣudradharmādharmaphalāni dharmādharmaprayukto devatānugrahādvāpaśyati
GV05brupsb4u:855: atha kvacidviviktaḥ svena jyotīrūpeṇopalabhyeta bāhyādhyātmikabhūtabhautikasaṃsargaśūnyastato yathoktaṃ sarvaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:856: bhaviṣyatītyedarthamāha-sa yaḥ prakṛta ātmā yatra yasminkāle prasvapiti
GV05brupsb4u:857: prakarṣeṇa svāpamanubhavati tadā kimupādānaḥ kena vidhinā svapiti saṃdhyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyata ityacyate /
GV05brupsb4u:858: asya dṛṣṭasya lokasyajāgaritalakṣaṇasya sarvāvataḥ sarvamavatīti sarvāvānayaṃ lokaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghāto viṣayavedanāsaṃyuktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:860: sarvā vā bhūtabhautikamātrā asya saṃsargakāṇabhūtā vidyanta iti sarvavānsarvāneva sarvāvāṃstasya
GV05brupsb4u:866: svayaṃ nirmāya nirmāṇaṃ kṛtvā vāsanāmayaṃ svapnadehaṃ māyāmayamiva /
GV05brupsb4u:868: svenā'tmīyena bhāsā mātropādānalakṣaṇena bhāsā dīptyā prakāśena sarvavāsanātmakenāntaḥkaraṇavṛkkiprakāśenetyarthaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:869: sā hi tatra viṣayabhūtā sarvavāsanāmayī prakāśate /
GV05brupsb4u:871: tena svena bhāsā viṣayabhūtena svena ca jyotiṣā tadviṣayiṇā viviktarūpeṇāluptadṛksvabhāvena tadbhāvarūpaṃ vāsanātmakaṃ viṣayīkurvanprasvapiti /
GV05brupsb4u:876: nanvasya lokasyamātropādānaṃ kṛtaṃ kathaṃ tasminsatyatrāyaṃ puraṣaḥ svayañjyotirbhavatītyucyate
GV05brupsb4u:879: tenaiva cātrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotirdarśayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:881: yadā punaḥ sā bhā vāsanātmikā viṣayabhūtopalabhyamānā bhavati tadāsiḥ kośādiva niṣkṛṣṭaḥ sarvasaṃsargarahitaṃ cakṣurādikāryakaraṇavyāvṛttasvarūpamaluptadṛgātmajyotiḥ svena rūpeṇāvabhāsayadgṛhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:884: na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti |
GV05brupsb4u:888: na tatra veśāntāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ sravantyo bhavanti |
GV05brupsb4u:891: BrhUpBh_4,3.10 nanvatra kathaṃ puruṣaḥ svayañjyotiryena jāgarata iva
GV05brupsb4u:894: tatra kathaṃ viśeṣāvadhāraṇaṃ kriyate 'trāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotirbhavatīti /
GV05brupsb4u:897: iha tu svapn indriyābhāvāttadanugrāhakādityādyālokābhāvācca viviktaṃ kevalaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:899: nanu tathaiva viṣayā upalabhyante svapne 'pi yathā jāgarite tatra
GV05brupsb4u:901: śṛṇu- na tatra liṣayāḥ svapne rathādilakṣaṇāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:902: tathā na rathayogā ratheṣu yujyanta iti rathayogā aśvādayastatra na vidyante /
GV05brupsb4u:906: ucyete-nanūktamasya lokasya sarvāvato mātrāmapādāya svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:907: nirmāyetyantaḥkaraṇavṛttirasya lokasya vyavatiṣṭhate taducyate svayaṃ nirmāyeti /
GV05brupsb4u:909: natu tatra karaṇaṃ vā karaṇānugrāgakāṇivā'dityādijyotīṃṣi tadavabhāsyā vā rathādayo viṣayā vidyante /
GV05brupsb4u:912: tathā na tatrā'nandāḥ sukhaviśeṣā mudo harṣā putrādilābhanimittāḥ pramudasta eva prakorṣopetāḥ
GV05brupsb4u:914: tathā na tatra veśāntāḥ palvalāḥpuṣkariṇyastaḍāgāḥ sravantyo nadyo bhavanti /
GV05brupsb4u:918: tasya kartṛtvaṃ na tu sākṣādeva tatra kriyā saṃbhavati sādhanābhāvāt /
GV05brupsb4u:920: na ca tatra hastapādādīni kriyākārakāṇi saṃbhavanti /
GV05brupsb4u:921: yatka tu tāni vidyante jāgarite tatrā'tmajyotiravabhāsitaiḥkāryakaraṇai
GV05brupsb4u:922: rathādivāsanāśrayāntaḥkaraṇavṛtyudbhavanimittaṃ karma nivartyate tenocyate sa hi karteti /
GV05brupsb4u:923: taduktamātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣā'ste palyayate karma kuruta iti /
GV05brupsb4u:924: tatrāpi na paramārthataḥ svataḥ kartṛtvaṃ caitanyajyotiṣo
GV05brupsb4u:926: yaccaitanyātmajyotiṣāntaḥkaraṇadvāreṇāvabhāsayati kāryakaraṇāni sadavabhāsitāni karmasu vyāpriyante kāryakaraṇāni tatra kartṛtvamupacaryata ātmanaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:932: śukram ādāya punar aiti sthānaṃ hiraṇmayaḥpuruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ || BrhUp_4,3.11
GV05brupsb4u:933: BrhUpBh_4,3.11 tadeva etasminnukter'tha ete ślokā mantrā bhavanti /

GV05brupsb4u:966: prasiddhirapi loke vidyate svapna ātmajyotiṣo vyatiriktatve /

GV05brupsb4u:974: tata āndhyabādhiryādidoṣaprāptau durbhaṣajyo duḥkhabhiṣakvarmatā hāsmai dehāya bhati duḥkhena cikitsanīyo 'sau deho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:976: svapno bhūtvātikrānto mṛtyo rūpāṇīti tasmātsvapne svayojyotirātmā /

GV05brupsb4u:980: śṛṇvato yadbhavati, yadā jāgaritadeśa evāyaṃ svapnastadāyamātmā kāryakaraṇebhyo na vyāvṛttastairmiśrībhūtaḥ

GV05brupsb4u:988: taduktaṃ na tatra rathā na rathayogā ityādi /
GV05brupsb4u:995: ato vidyāniṣkriyārthaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmītyāha janakaḥ so 'hamevaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:999: itastvāṃ niyokṣyāmi samastakāmapraśnanirṇayaśravaṇena vimokṣāyāta ūrdhvaṃ brūhīti /
GV05brupsb4u:1003: sa vā eṣa etasmin saṃprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāyaiva |
GV05brupsb4u:1004: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati |
GV05brupsb4u:1011: yattūktaṃ svpano bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati mṛtyo rūpāṇīti /
GV05brupsb4u:1015: karmaṇo hi mṛtyoḥ kāryaṃ modatrāsādi dṛśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1016: yadi ca mṛtyunā baddha evāyaṃ svabhāvatastato vimokṣo nopapadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1019: atha svabhāvo na bhavati mṛtyustatastasmānmokṣa upapatsyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1020: yathāsau mṛtyurātmāyo dharmo na bhavati tathā pradarśanāyāta ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāya brūhītyevaṃ janakena paryanuyukto yājñavalkyastaddidarśayiṣayā pravavṛte - sa vai prakṛtaḥ svayañjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1021: eṣa yaḥ svapne pradarśita etasminsaṃprasāde samyakprasīdatyasminniti saṃprasādaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1022: jāgarite dehendriyavyāpāraśatasaṃnipātajaṃ hitvā kāluṣyaṃ tebhyo vipramukta īṣatprasīdati svapne /
GV05brupsb4u:1023: iha tu suṣupte samyakprasīdatītyataḥ suṣuptaṃ saṃprasāda ucyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1024: "tīrṇo hi tadā sarvān śokān""salila eko draṣṭe"ti vakṣyati suṣuptasthamātmānam /
GV05brupsb4u:1025: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde krameṇa saṃprannaḥ sansuṣupte sthitvā /
GV05brupsb4u:1027: svapnātsuṣuptaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svapnāvastha eva ratvā ratimanubhūya mitrabandhujanadarśanāditā taritvā vihṛtyānekadhā caraṇaphalaṃ śramamupalabhyetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1028: dṛṣṭvaiva na kṛtvetyarthaḥ puṇyaṃ ca puṇyaphalaṃ pāpaṃ ca pāpaphalam /
GV05brupsb4u:1031: yo hi karoti puṇyapāpe sa tābhyāmanubadhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1033: tasmātsvapno bhūtvā mṛtyumatikrāmatyeva na mṛtyumatikrāmatyeva na mṛtyurūpāṇyeva kevalam /
GV05brupsb4u:1046: tataḥ saṃprasādānuvabhottarakālaṃ punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ yathāgataṃ niścita āyo nyāyaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1047: ayanamāyo nirgamanaṃ punaḥ pūrvagamanaparītyena yadāgamanaṃ sa pratinyāyaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1052: nanu svapne na karoti puṇyapāpe tayoḥ phalameva kathamavagamyate tathā jāgarite yathā karotyeva svapne 'pi tulyatvāddarśanasyeti, ata āha sa ātmā yatkiñcittatra svapne paśyati puṇyapāpaphalamanvāgato 'nanubaddhastena
GV05brupsb4u:1054: yadi hi svapne kṛtameva tena syāttenānubadhyeta /
GV05brupsb4u:1058: na ca svapnadṛśaḥ āgaḥ śrutvā lokastaṃ garhati pariharati vā /
GV05brupsb4u:1060: ākhyātāraścasvapnal sahevaśabdenā'cakṣate hastino 'dya ghaṭīkṛtā dhāvantīva mayā dṛṣṭā iti
GV05brupsb4u:1063: kāryakaraṇairmūrtaiḥ saṃśleṣo mūrtasya sa tu kriyāheturdṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1067: kāryakaraṇasaṃśleṣeṇa hi kartṛtvaṃ syātsa ca saśleṣaḥ saṅgo 'sya nāsti yato 'saṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1070: so 'haṃ bhagavate sahasraṃ dadāmyata ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāyaiva brūhi /
GV05brupsb4u:1074: sa vā eṣa etasmin svapne ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati buddhāntāyaiva |
GV05brupsb4u:1075: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati |

GV05brupsb4u:1091: sa vā eṣa etasmin buddhānte ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāntāyaiva || BrhUp_4,3.17 ||
GV05brupsb4u:1093: pratyāgato na lipyata evaṃ jāgaritasaṅgajairapu doṣānra lipyata eva buddhāntena tadetaducyate- sa vā eṣa etasminbuddhānte jāgarite ratvā
GV05brupsb4u:1095: sa yattatra buddhānte kiñcitpaśyatyanatvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣa iti /

GV05brupsb4u:1101: iha tu paramārthāpekṣayopādhinirapekṣa ucyate dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpañca na kṛtveti tena na pūrvāparavyāghātāśaṅkā /
GV05brupsb4u:1102: yasmānnirupādhikaḥ paramārthato na karoti na lipyate kriyāphalena /

GV05brupsb4u:1107: tathā sa vā eṣa etasminsvapne sa vā eṣa etasminbuddhānta ityetābhyāṃ kaṇḍikābhyāmasaṅgataiva pratipāditā /
GV05brupsb4u:1108: yasmādbuddhānte kṛtena svapnānte gataḥ saṃprasanno 'saṃbaddho bhavati stainyādikāryādarśanāttasmāttriṣvapi sthāneṣu svato 'saṅga evāyam /

GV05brupsb4u:1117: tad yathā mahāmatsya ubhe kūle anusaṃcarati pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca |
GV05brupsb4u:1118: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etāv ubhāv antāv anusaṃcarati svapnāntaṃ ca buddhāntaṃ ca || BrhUp_4,3.18
GV05brupsb4u:1119: BrhUpBh_4,3.18 evamayaṃ puruṣa ātmā svayañjyotiḥ kāryakaraṇavilakṣaṇastatprayojakābhyā kāmakarmabhyāṃ vilakṣa ṇo yasmādasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣo 'saṅtvādityayamarthaḥ"sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāda"ityādyābhistasṛbhiḥ kaṇḍakābhiḥ pratipāditaḥ /

GV05brupsb4u:1122: pūrvamapyupanyasto 'yamarthaḥ svapne bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati mṛtyo rūpāṇīti taṃ vistareṇa pratipādya kevalaṃ dṛṣṭāntamātramavaśiṣṭaṃ

GV05brupsb4u:1132: tad yathāsminn ākāśe śyeno vā suparṇo vā viparipatya śrāntaḥ saṃhatya pakṣau saṃlayāyaiva dhriyate |
GV05brupsb4u:1133: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etasmā antāya dhavati |

GV05brupsb4u:1135: BrhUpBh_4,3.19 atra ca sthānatrayānusaṃtāreṇa svayañjyotiṣa ātmanaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātavyatiriktasya kāmakarmabhyāṃ vivaktatoktā svato nāyaṃ saṃsāradharmavānupādhinimittameva tvasya saṃsāritvamavidyādhyāropitamityeṣa samudāyārtha uktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1136: tatra ca jāgratsvapnasuṣuptasthānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ viprakīrṇarūpa ukto na puñjīkṛtyaikatra darśitaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1141: ekavākyatayā tūpasaṃhrayamāṇaṃ phalaṃ nityamuktabuddhaśuddhasvabhāvatāsya naikatra puñjīkṛtya pradarśiteti tatpradarśanāya kaṇḍikā'rabhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1142: suṣupte hyevaṃrūpatāsya vakṣyamāṇā"tadvā asyaitadaticchandā apahatapāpmābhayaṃ rūpāmi"ti /
GV05brupsb4u:1144: tatkathamityāha-dṛṣṭāntenāsyārthasya prakaṭībhāvo bhavatīti tatra dṛṣṭānta upādīyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1145: tadyathāsminnākāśe bhautike śyeno vā suparṇo vā /
GV05brupsb4u:1147: yathā'kāśe 'sminvihṛtya viparipatya śrānto nānāparipatanalakṣaṇena karmaṇā parikhinnaḥ saṃhṛtya pakṣau saṃgamayya pakṣau samyaglīyate 'sminniti
GV05brupsb4u:1148: saṃlayo nīḍo nīḍāyaiva dhriyate svātmanaiva dhrāyate svayameva /
GV05brupsb4u:1149: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta evamevāyaṃ puruṣa etasyā etasmai antāya dhāvati /
GV05brupsb4u:1150: antaśabdavācyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ yatra yasminnante supto na kañcana na kañcidapi kāmaṃ kāmayate
GV05brupsb4u:1151: tathā ca na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:1152: na kañcana kāmiti svapnbuddhāntayoraviśeṣeṇa sarvaḥ kāmaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1155: jāgarite 'pi yaddarśanaṃ tadapi svapnaṃ manyate śrutirata āha-na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyatīti
GV05brupsb4u:1156: tathā ca śrutyantaram"tasya traya āvasathāstrayaḥ svapnāḥ"iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1157: yathā dṛṣṭānte pakṣiṇaḥ paripatanajaśramāpanupattaye svanīḍaupasarpaṇamevaṃ jāgratsvapnayoḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃyogajakriyāphalaiḥ saṃyujyamānasya pakṣiṇaḥ paripatanaja iva śramo bhavaci tacchmāpanuttaye svātmano nīḍāmāyatanaṃ sarvasaṃsāradharmavilakṣaṇaṃ sarvakriyākārakaphalāyāsaśūnyaṃ svamātmānaṃ praviśati //4,3.19//
GV05brupsb4u:1159: tā vā asyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinnas tāvatāṇimnā tiṣṭhanti |
GV05brupsb4u:1160: śuklasya nīlasya piṅgalasya haritasya lohitasya pūrṇāḥ |
GV05brupsb4u:1161: atha yatrainaṃ ghnantīva jinantīva hastīva vicchāyayati gartam iva patati
GV05brupsb4u:1162: yad eva jāgrad bhayaṃ paśyati tad atrāvidyayā manyate |
GV05brupsb4u:1163: atha yatra deva iva rājevāham evedaṃ sarvo 'smīti manyate |
GV05brupsb4u:1167: yannimittaṃ cāsya paropādhikṛtaṃ saṃsāradharmitvaṃ sā cāvidyā /
GV05brupsb4u:1172: kaṇḍikā'rabhyate- tā vā asya śiraḥpāṇyādilakṣaṇasya puruṣasyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinnastāvatā tāvatparimāṇenāṇimnāṇutvena tiṣṭhanti /
GV05brupsb4u:1173: tāśṭa śuklasya rasasya nīlasya piṅgalasya haritasya lohitasya pūrṇā etaiḥ śuklatvādibhī rasaviśeṣaiḥ pūrṇā ityarthaḥ /

GV05brupsb4u:1175: tāsvevavidhāsu nāḍīṣu sūkṣmāsu bālāgrasahasrabhedaparimāṇāsu śuklādirasapūrṇāsu saraladehavyāpinīṣu saptadaśakaṃ liṅgaṃ vartate /
GV05brupsb4u:1177: talliṅgaṃ vāsanāśrayaṃ sūkṣmatvātsvacchaṃ sphaṭikamaṇikalpaṃ nāḍīgatarasopādhisaṃsargavaśāddharmādharmapreritodbhūtavṛttiviśeṣaṃ strīrathahastyādyākāraviśeṣairvāsanābhiḥ pratyavabhāsate /
GV05brupsb4u:1178: athaivaṃ sati yatra yasminkāle kecana śatravo 'nye vā taskarā māmāgatya
GV05brupsb4u:1179: ghnantīti mṛṣaiva vāsanānimittaḥ pratyayo 'vidyākhyo jāyate tadetaducyata enaṃ svapnadṛśaṅghnantīveti
GV05brupsb4u:1180: tathā hastīvainaṃ vicchāyayati vicchādayati vidrāvayati dhāvayatīvetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1183: kiṃbahunā yadeva jāgradbhayaṃ hastyādilakṣaṇaṃ tadeva bhayarūpamatrāsminsvapne vinaiva hastyādirūpaṃ bhayamavidyāvāsanayā mṛṣaivodbhūtayā manyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1184: atha punaryatrāvidyāpakṛṣyamāṇā vidyā cotkṛṣyamāṇā kiṃviṣayā kiṃlakṣaṇā
GV05brupsb4u:1185: cetyucyate-atha punaryatra yasminkāle deva iva svayaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1186: devatāviṣayā vidyā yadodbhūtā jāgaritakāle tadodbhūtayā vāsanayā
GV05brupsb4u:1188: svapne 'pi taducyate deva iva rājeva rājyastho 'bhiṣiktaḥ svapne 'pi
GV05brupsb4u:1190: evamatyantaprakṣīyamāṇāvidyodbhūtā ca vidyā sarvātmaviṣayā yadā yadā svapne 'pi tadbhāvito 'hamevedaṃ sarvo 'smīti manyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1191: sa yaḥ sarvātmabhāvaḥ so 'syā'tmanaḥ paramo lokaḥ parama ātmabhāvaḥ svābhāvakaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1193: tadavasthāvidyī tayāvidyayā ye pratyupasthāpitā anātmabhāvā lokāste
GV05brupsb4u:1195: tasmādapakṛṣyamāṇāyāmavidyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ ca kāṣṭāṃ gatāyāṃ sarvātmabhāvo mokṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1196: yathā svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ svapne pratyakṣata evopalabhyate 'tha yatrainaṃ ghnantīva jinantīveti
GV05brupsb4u:1204: samastastu sankuto bhidyate yena virudhyetavirodābhāve kena hanyate jīyate vicchādyate ca
GV05brupsb4u:1213: vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyatītyādi /
GV05brupsb4u:1216: sā cāvidyā nā'tmanaḥ svābhāviko dharmo yasmādvidyāyāmutkṛṣyamāṇāyāṃ
GV05brupsb4u:1217: svayamapacīyamānā satī kāṣṭhāṃ gatāyāṃ vidyāyāṃpariniṣṭhite sarvātmabhāve sarvātmanā nivartate rajjvāmiva sarpajñānaṃ rajjuniścaye /
GV05brupsb4u:1218: taccoktaṃ yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyedityādi /
GV05brupsb4u:1224: tad yathā priyayā striyā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaram |
GV05brupsb4u:1225: evam evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaram |
GV05brupsb4u:1226: tad vā asyaitad āptakāmam ātmakāmam akāmaṃ rūpam śokāntaram ||
GV05brupsb4u:1227: BrhUpBh_4,3.21 idānīṃ yo 'sau sarvātmabhāvo mokṣo vidyāphalaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:1228: kriyākārakaphalaśūnyaṃ sa pratyakṣato nirdiśyate yatrāvidyākāmakarmāṇi na santi /
GV05brupsb4u:1229: tadetadprastutaṃ yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyātīti /
GV05brupsb4u:1230: tadetadvā asya rūpaṃ yaḥ sarvātmabhāvaḥ 'so 'sya paramo
GV05brupsb4u:1232: chandaḥ kāmaḥ, atigataścando yasmād rūpāt tadaticchandaṃ rūpam; anyo 'sau
GV05brupsb4u:1233: sāntaśchandaḥśabdo gāyatryādichandovācī; ayaṃ tu kāmavacanaḥ, ataḥ svarānta eva; tathāpyaticchandā iti pāṭhaḥ svādhyāyadharmo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1238: kiñca, abhayam-bhayaṃ hi nāmāvidyākāryam, 'avidyayā bhayaṃ manyate' iti hyuttkam /
GV05brupsb4u:1244: ayamātmā svayaṃ caitanyajyotiḥ-svabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ svena caitanyajyotiṣāvabhāsayati /
GV05brupsb4u:1245: sa yattatra kiñcit paśyati, ramate,carati,jānāti cetyuttkam /
GV05brupsb4u:1251: dṛṣṭāntena hi pratyakṣībhavati vivakṣitor'tha ityāha-tattatra yathā loke priyayeṣṭāyā striyā sampariṣvattakaḥ samyak pariṣvattkaḥ kāmayantyā
GV05brupsb4u:1252: kāmukaḥ san na bāhyamātmanaḥ kiñcana kiñcidapi veda-matto 'nyad vastviti,
GV05brupsb4u:1253: na cāntaram-ayamahamāsmi sukhī duḥkhī veti; apariṣvattkastu tathā pravibhattko jānāti sarvabheva brāhyam ābhyantaraṃ ca;
GV05brupsb4u:1255: evameva, yathā dṛṣṭānto 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ kṣetrajño bhūtamātrāsaṃsargataḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1256: saindhavakhilyavat pravibhattkaḥ, jalādau candrādipratibimbavat kāryakaraṇa iha praviṣṭaḥ, so 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ, prajñena paramārthena svābhāvikena svenātmanā pareṇa jyotiṣā, sampariṣvattkaḥ samyakpariṣvakta ekībhūto nirantaraḥ sarvātmā, na bāhyaṃ kiñcana vastvantaram,
GV05brupsb4u:1258: tatra caitanyajyotiḥ svabhāvatve kasmādiha na jānātīti yadaprākṣīḥ,
GV05brupsb4u:1259: tatrāyaṃ heturmayottka ekatvam, yathā strīpuṃsayoḥ sampariṣvattkayoḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1260: tatrārthānnānātvaṃ viśeṣavijñānaheturityuttkaṃ bhavati; nānātve ca kāraṇ-ātmano vastavantarasya pratyupasthāpikāvidyetyuktam /
GV05brupsb4u:1261: tatra cāvidyāyā yadā pravivikto bhavati tadā sarveṇaikatvamevāsya bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1262: tataśca jñānajñeyādikārakavibhāge 'sati kuto viśeṣavijñānaprādurbhāvaḥ kāmo vā sambhavati svābhāvike svarūpstha ātmajyotiṣi /
GV05brupsb4u:1263: yasmādevaṃ sarvaikatvamevāsya rūpamatastadvā asyā'tmanaḥ svayañjyotiḥ svabhavasyaitadrūpamāptakāmaṃ yasmātmastametattasmādāptāḥ kāmā asminrūpe tadidamāptakāmam /
GV05brupsb4u:1265: yathā jāgaritāvasthāyāṃ devadattādirūpaṃ na tvidaṃ tathā kutaścitpravibhajyate 'tastadāptakāmaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1266: kimanyasmādvastvantarānna pravibhajyata āhosvidātmaiva tadvastvantaramata āha nānyadastyātmanaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1268: yata ātmakāmamātmaiva kāmā yasmin rūpe 'nyatra pravibhaktā ivānyatvena kāmyamānā yathā
GV05brupsb4u:1270: abhāvādātmakāmamata evākāmametadrūpaṃ kāmyaviṣayābhāvācchokāntaraṃ śākacchidraṃ śokaśūnyamityetacchokamadhyamiti vā sarvathāpyaśokametadrūpaṃ śokavarjitamityarthaḥ //4,3.21//
GV05brupsb4u:1272: atra pitāpitā bhavati mātāmātā lokā alokā devā adevā vedā avedāḥ |
GV05brupsb4u:1273: atra steno 'steno bhavati bhrūṇahābhrūṇahā cāṇḍyālo 'caṇḍyālaḥ paulkaso
GV05brupsb4u:1276: tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñ śokān hṛdayasya bhavati || BrhUp_4,3.22 ||
GV05brupsb4u:1279: tatraivamāśaṅkā jāyate caitanyasvabhāvatve satyapyekībhāvānna jānāti strīpuṃsayoriva saṃpariṣvaktayorityuktam
GV05brupsb4u:1281: yasmātsaṃprasāde nopalabhyata ityāśaṅkāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tannirākaraṇāya strīpuṃsayordṛṣṭāntopādānena vidyamānasyaiva svayañjyotiṣṭvasya suṣupte
GV05brupsb4u:1284: atra caitatprakṛtamavidyākāmakarmavinirmuktameva tadrūpaṃ yatsuṣupta ātmano gṛhyate pratyakṣata iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1287: tasya ca janayitṛtvādyatpitṛtvaṃ putraṃ prati tatkarmanimittaṃ tena ca karmaṇāyamasaṃbaddho 'sminkāle tasmātpitāputrasaṃbandhanimittāt karmaṇo vinirmuktatvātpitāpyapitā bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1291: tathāmātāmātālokāḥ karmaṇā jetavyā jitāśca tatkarmasaṃbandhābhāvāllokā alokāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1293: tathā vedāḥ sādhyasādhanasaṃbandhābhidhāyakā mantralakṣaṇāścābhidhākatvena karmāṅgabhūtā adhītā adhyetavyāśca karmanimittameva saṃbadhyante puruṣeṇa tatkarmātikramaṇādetasminkāle vedā apyavedāḥ saṃpadyante /
GV05brupsb4u:1294: na kevalaṃ śubhakarmasaṃbandhātītaḥ kiṃ tarhyaśubhairapyatyantaghoraiḥ karmabhirasaṃbaddha evāyaṃ vartata ityatamarthāmāha-atra steno brāhmaṇasuvarṇahartā bhrūṇaghnā saha pāṭhādavagamyate sa tena ghoroṇa karmaṇaitasminkāle vinirmukto bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1296: tathā bhrūṇahābhrūṇahā tathā cāṇḍālo na kevalaṃ pratyutpannenaiva karmaṇā vinirmuktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1298: cāṇḍālo nāma śūdreṇa brāhmaṇyāmutpannaścaṇḍāla eva cāṇḍālaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1300: paulkasaḥ pulkasa eva paulkasaḥ śūdreṇaiva kṣatriyāyāmutpannaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1303: śramaṇaḥ parivrāḍyatkarmanimitto bhavati sa tena vinirmuktatvādaśramaṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1305: kiṃ bahunānvāgataṃ nānvāgatamananvāgatamasaṃbandhamityetatpuṇyena śāstravihitena karmaṇā tathā pāpena vihitākaraṇapratiṣiddhakriyālakṣaṇena /
GV05brupsb4u:1308: kiṃ punarasaṃbaddhatve kāraṇamiti taddheturucyate-tīrṇo 'tikrānto hi yasmādevaṃrūpastadā tasminkāle sarvāñchokāñśokāḥ kāmāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1310: iṣṭaṃ hi viṣayaṃmaprāptaṃ viyuktaṃ coddiśya cintayānastadguṇānsaṃtapyate puruṣo 'taḥ śoko ratiḥ kāma iti paryāyāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1312: na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate 'ticchandā iti hyuktaṃ tatprakriyāpatato 'yaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:1315: vakṣyati hi-"sa yathākāmo bhavati tatkrayurbhavati yatkraturbhavati tatkarma kurute"iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1319: hṛdayasya buddherye śokāḥ buddhisaṃśrayā hi te /
GV05brupsb4u:1322: ātmasaṃśrayabhrāntyapanodāya hīdaṃ vacanaṃ-hṛdi śritā hṛdayasya śokā iti ca /
GV05brupsb4u:1325: ye tu vādino hṛdi śritāḥ kāmā vāsanāśca hṛdayasaṃbandhinamātmanamupasṛpyopaśliṣyanti hṛdayaviyoge
GV05brupsb4u:1327: teṣāṃ kāmaḥ saṃkalpo hṛdaye haryova rūpāṇi hṛdayasya śokā ityādīnāṃ vacanānāmānarthakyameva
GV05brupsb4u:1331: na hi hṛdayasya karaṇamātratve hṛdi śritā iti vacanaṃ samañjasaṃ hṛdaye hyeva rūpāṇi pratiṣṭhitānīti ca /
GV05brupsb4u:1334: kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritā iti viśeṣaṇādātmāśrayā api santīti cet /
GV05brupsb4u:1336: anāśritāpekṣatvāt nātrā'śrayāntaramapekṣya ye hṛdīti viśeṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tarhi ye hṛdyanāśritāḥ kāmāstānapekṣya viśeṣaṇam /
GV05brupsb4u:1337: ye tvaprarūñā bhaviṣyā bhūtāśca pratipakṣato nivṛttāste naiva hṛdi śritāḥ saṃbhāvyante ca te /
GV05brupsb4u:1339: ye prarūḍhā vartamānā viṣaye te sarve pramucyanta iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1344: na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayata iti prāptapratiṣedhādātmāśrayatvaṃ kāmānāṃ śrutameveti cet /
GV05brupsb4u:1349: ātmakāma iti śruterātmaviṣayo 'sya kāmo bhavatīti cet /
GV05brupsb4u:1355: kāmādīnāṃ ca svapne kevaladṛśimātraviṣayatvātsvayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ siddhaṃ sthitaṃ ca bādhyeta
GV05brupsb4u:1362: mahatā hi prayatnena kāmādyāśrayatvakalapnājha pratiṣeddhavyā ātmānaḥ pareṇaikatvaśāstrārthasiddhayeḥ tatkalpanāyāṃ punaḥ kriyamāṇāyāṃ śāstrārthaṃ eva bādhitaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:1366: yad vai tan na paśyati paśyan vai tan na paśyati |
GV05brupsb4u:1367: na hi draṣṭur dṛṣṭer viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvān |
GV05brupsb4u:1368: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yat paśyet || BrhUp_4,3.23 ||
GV05brupsb4u:1372: yadi hyagnyuṣṇatvādivaccaitanyātmasvabhāva ātmā sa kathamekatve 'pi hi svabhāvaṃ jahyānna jānīyāt /
GV05brupsb4u:1373: atha na jahāti kathamiha suṣupte na paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:1376: katham-yadvai suṣupte tanna paśyati paśyanvai tattatra paśyanneva na paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:1377: yattatra suṣupte na paśyatīti jānīṣe tanna tathā gṛhṇīyāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1380: nanvānaṃ na paśyatīti suṣupte jānīme yato na cakṣurvā mano vā darśane karaṇaṃ vyāpṛtamasti
GV05brupsb4u:1381: vyāpṛteṣu hi darśanaśravaṇādiṣu paśyatīti vyavahāro bhavati śṛṇotīti vā /
GV05brupsb4u:1387: na hi yasmāddraṣṭurdṛṣṭakarturyā dṛṣṭistasyā dṛṣṭerviparilopo vināśaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1390: nanu vipratiṣiddhamidamabhidhīyate draṣṭuḥ sā dṛṣṭirna viparilupyata ita cāśakyaṃ vaktum /
GV05brupsb4u:1391: nanu na viparilupyata iti vacanādavināśinī syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:1394: nahi nyāyaprāpto vināśaḥ kṛtakasya vacanaśatenāpi vārayituṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1401: yathā'dityādayo nityaprakāśasvabhāvā eva santaḥ svābhāvikena nityenaiva prakāśena prakāśayanti
GV05brupsb4u:1402: na hyaprakāśātmānaḥ santaḥ prakāśaṃ kurvantaḥ prakāśayantītyucyante /
GV05brupsb4u:1406: naivameva mukhyatvopapatteḥ yadi hyanyathāpyātmano draṣṭutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadāsya draṣṭutvasya gauṇatvaṃ na tvātmano 'nyo darśanaprakāro 'sti
GV05brupsb4u:1409: prakāśakena tadeva ca prakāśayitṛtvaṃ mukhyaṃ prakāśayitṛtvāntarānupapatteḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1411: nanvanityakriyākartṛviṣaya eva tṛcpratyayāntasya śabdasya prayogo dṛṣṭo yathā chettā bhettā ganteti tathā draṣṭetyatrāpīti cet /
GV05brupsb4u:1421: atasyāvipariluptayā dṛṣṭyā svayañjyotiḥsvabhāvayā paśyanneva bhavati suṣupte /
GV05brupsb4u:1427: tato draṣciranyadanyatvena vibhaktaṃ yatpaśyedyadupalabheta yaddhi tadviśeṣadarśanakāraṇamantaḥkaraṇaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ ca tadavidyayānyatvena pratyupasthāpitamāsīt /
GV05brupsb4u:1431: ayaṃ tu svena sarvātmanā saṃpiṣvaktaḥ svena pareṇa prājñenā'tmanā
GV05brupsb4u:1433: tena na pṛthaktvena vyavasthitāni karaṇāni viṣayāśca /
GV05brupsb4u:1439: yad vai tan na jighrati jighran vai tan na jighrati |
GV05brupsb4u:1440: na hi ghrātur ghrāter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1441: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yaj jighret || BrhUp_4,3.24
GV05brupsb4u:1442: yad vai tan na rasayati rasayan vai tan na rasayati |
GV05brupsb4u:1443: na hi rasayitū rasayater viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1444: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad rasayet || BrhUp_4,3.25
GV05brupsb4u:1445: yad vai tan na vadati vadan vai tan na vadati |
GV05brupsb4u:1446: na hi vaktur vakter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1447: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad vadet || BrhUp_4,3.26 ||
GV05brupsb4u:1448: yad vai tan na śṛṇoti śṛṇvan vai tan na śṛṇoti |
GV05brupsb4u:1449: na hi śrotuḥ śruter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1450: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yac chṛṇuyāt || BrhUp_4,3.27
GV05brupsb4u:1451: yad vai tan na manute manvāno vai tan na manute |
GV05brupsb4u:1452: na hi mantur mater viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1453: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yan manvīta || BrhUp_4,3.28
GV05brupsb4u:1454: yad vai tan na spṛśati spṛśan vai tan na spṛśati |
GV05brupsb4u:1455: na hi spraṣṭuḥ spṛṣṭer viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1456: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yat spṛśet || BrhUp_4,3.29 ||
GV05brupsb4u:1457: yad vai tan na vijānāti vijānan vai tan na vijānāti |
GV05brupsb4u:1458: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt |
GV05brupsb4u:1459: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad vijānīyāt || BrhUp_4,3.30
GV05brupsb4u:1468: yadvai tanna vijānātīti mananavijñānayordṛṣṭyādisahakāritve 'pi sati cakṣurādinirapekṣe bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānaviṣayavyāpāro vidyata iti pṛthaggrahaṇam /
GV05brupsb4u:1471: ātmavastunaḥ svata evaikatvaṃ nānātvaṃ ca yathā gorgodravyatayaikatvaṃ nānātvaṃ cānumeyam
GV05brupsb4u:1475: na hi dṛṣṭyādidharmabhedapradarśaparamidaṃ vākyaṃ yadvai tadityādi /

GV05brupsb4u:2118: 'traivasarvātmā sanvartamānaḥ punaḥ pūrvavaddehitvaṃ saṃsāritvalakṣaṇaṃ na pratipadyata iti /
